title.narrative: Facility for Oil Sector Transformation II Procurement of services - Technical advice to Government; support to civil society engagement

description.narrative: This activity (Facility for Oil Sector Transformation II Procurement of services - Technical advice to Government; support to civil society engagement) is a component of Facility for Oil Sector Transformation II reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £18,100,993. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Anti-corruption organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 01-04-2016 and the end date is 30-06-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
Justice, Law and Order - Justice, Law, Order and Security - Justice, Law and Order - prisons
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2017 Quarter 4
